trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
A string that contains "Hyperlink".
Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.

Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
The string that contains the label.
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value in the enumeration.
If patternInterface is , this method returns a pointer; otherwise, this method returns .

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.HyperlinkAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
